topic: Uncovering the heart of my Nana’s saltwater stories

ideas.title: The Brighton Bathing Box Time Machine
ideas.premise: Nana’s saltwater story transports her back in time, altering a Brighton bathing box’s colour scheme with hilariously disastrous results.
ideas.why_funny: Historical inaccuracy meets Melbourne icon: beachside chaos!

ideas.title: Snapper Point Snapper Heist
ideas.premise: Nana's yarn about catching a prized snapper turns out to be a highly elaborate, cartoonish Ocean's Eleven-style heist at Snapper Point.
ideas.why_funny: Unexpected criminal mastermind Nana targeting unsuspecting fish.

ideas.title: The Port Phillip Bay Kraken
ideas.premise: Nana describes encountering a kraken in Port Phillip Bay, but it's actually a grumpy giant squid tangled in shipping containers.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable marine monster with uniquely Melbourne problems.

ideas.title: St Kilda Pier Fairy Penguins' Union
ideas.premise: Nana claims the St Kilda penguins are secretly negotiating a union contract for better fish and more sheltered nesting sites.
ideas.why_funny: Adorable activism: penguins demanding better working conditions.

ideas.title: South Melbourne Market Mermaid
ideas.premise: Nana swears she bought a mermaid's tail at South Melbourne Market, but it keeps turning out to be overpriced imported scarves.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable market experience with mythical, wishful thinking.

ranking: The Brighton Bathing Box Time Machine
St Kilda Pier Fairy Penguins' Union
winner: The Brighton Bathing Box Time Machine
